title: Sajith meets UN Food Program delegation
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Leader of the Opposition Sajith Premadasa met a delegation consisting of the Country Director of Sri Lanka – World Food Program Abdul Rahim Siddique, the Permanent Representative to Sri Lanka and the Maldives – Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations Vimalendra Sharan and the Deputy Director for Sri Lanka – United Nations World Food Program Mr. Andrea Berardo, yesterday (19) at the Office of the Leader of the Opposition.

The delegation had a long deliberation with the Opposition Leader on the issues pertaining to the current food crisis and food security in Sri Lanka, including the need to maintain a clean and disinfected environment from the point of production up until consumption.
The food crisis Sri Lanka has encountered at present was taken into particular consideration.
Sri Lanka Football reveals 3-year plan with Qatar Football Association
